Topic.Title: How to turn a Quest game into an app?

Posts.EditableText:
Hi! I'm new here. I made a gamebook. I know it says you can turn your game into an app, and that there's already kind of a forum for it here: http://textadventures.co.uk/forum/quest/topic/4451/questjs-update#p29325 .

But could someone tell me exactly what I need to do once I get to this website? I'd appreciate any replies. Thanks in advance.   https://github.com/textadventures/quest/tree/v6
